glsa.title: OpenVPN: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in OpenVPN could lead to Denial of Service.

background.p: OpenVPN is a multi-platform, full-featured SSL VPN solution.

description.p: OpenVPN does not properly handle control channel packets that are too small.

impact.p: A remote authenticated attacker could send a specially crafted control channel packet, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenVPN users should upgrade to the latest version:
